guest.title: Welcome to ProMatch Analytics
guest.message: Your account is pending approval. Our administrators will review your request and grant you the appropriate access level soon.
guest.contactMessage: If you have any questions, please contact the administrator.

sync.offline: You are offline. Changes will be synced when connection is restored.

admin.rolePlaceholder: E.g: Technical Director, Assistant, Fitness Coach

ingestion.title: Data Import Manager
ingestion.subtitle: Import your data easily using CSV or JSON files. Download templates to get started quickly!
ingestion.adminOnlyDesc: You need administrator permissions to import data into the system.
ingestion.countriesDesc: Use full country names (e.g., 'England', 'Spain', 'United States'). These are case-insensitive.
ingestion.playerPositionsDesc: Valid codes: GK, CB, LB, RB, LWB, RWB, SW, CDM, CM, CAM, LM, RM, LW, RW, CF, ST, LF, RF, SS
ingestion.duplicatesDesc: The system automatically checks for similar existing records. You'll be able to review and decide what to do with potential duplicates.
ingestion.matchesDesc: When importing, we'll show you records that might already exist so you can avoid duplicates. Smart matching helps keep your data clean!
ingestion.competitionsDesc: Import leagues, tournaments, and competitions with country and gender information
ingestion.venuesDesc: Import stadiums and playing facilities with location details
ingestion.refereesDesc: Import match officials with their nationality and experience
ingestion.playersDesc: Import athlete profiles with positions, stats, and personal details
ingestion.teamsDesc: Import club information including rosters, managers, and technical staff
ingestion.bulkDesc: Save time! Upload competitions, venues, referees, players, and teams all in a single file. You can include just one type or all five - it's flexible!
ingestion.bulkPrompt:
Create a bulk import file with all entity types in CSV format. Use section markers to separate each model type:

# COMPETITIONS
name,country_name,gender
Premier League,England,male
La Liga,Spain,female

# VENUES
name,city,country_name
Old Trafford,Manchester,England
Camp Nou,Barcelona,Spain

# REFEREES
name,country_name
Michael Oliver,England
St√©phanie Frappart,France

# PLAYERS
name,birth_date,player_height,player_weight,country_name,position
Erling Haaland,2000-07-21,194,88,Norway,ST
Alexia Putellas,1994-02-04,170,58,Spain,CM

# TEAMS
name,short_name,country,gender,founded_year,stadium,manager
Manchester City,MCI,England,male,1880,Etihad Stadium,Pep Guardiola
FC Barcelona,FCB,Spain,female,1970,Camp Nou,Jonatan Gir√°ldez

For JSON format, use nested structure:
{
  "competitions": [{...}],
  "venues": [{...}],
  "referees": [{...}],
  "players": [{...}],
  "teams": [{...}]
}

All sections are optional - include only the models you want to import.
ingestion.bulkTemplateNote: üí° This template includes sample data for all 5 entity types. You can remove any sections you don't need!

ingestion.exportInfo: This will export all {{model}} from the database in {{format}} format.
ingestion.aiPromptDescription: Use this prompt with ChatGPT, Claude, or any AI assistant to generate properly formatted import data
ingestion.aiPromptCopyTooltip: Copy prompt to use with your AI assistant
